# [Aviation Replacement Parts for C-17 Globemaster](#Aviation-Replacement-Parts-for-C-17-Globemaster)

## **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**
A solicitation has been issued by the Department of National Defence (DND) for the acquisition of 1 item(s) for the C-17 Globemaster. The requirement is for the procurement of replacement parts.

### **Supply Arrangement (SA)#
Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series is the framework under which this procurement will take place.

### **Solicitation Number**
The solicitation number is W8485-248027/A.

### **Eligible Bidders**
The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* B S F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Simex Defence Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Tulmar Safety
* Canada West Avionics
* Honeywell Ltd
* M1 Composites Technology
* Rockwell Collins Canada

### **Proposal Submission**
The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to the eligible bidders.

### **Contact Information**
For any inquiries, please contact:

* Ivan Khanzadeev, Contracting Authority
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* Email: [Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-4277

### **Opportunity for Qualification**
A Notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-27T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-11
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-01-25

## **Technical Specifications**

The procurement is for 1 item(s) of replacement parts for the C-17 Globemaster.
